details:
adjective
- slow to learn or understand
= synonyms: slow
- having high relative density or specific gravity
= example: having high relative density or specific gravity
- hard to pass through because of dense growth
= example: hard to pass through because of dense growth
= synonyms: thick
- permitting little if any light to pass through because of denseness of matter
= example: permitting little if any light to pass through because of denseness of matter
= synonyms: heavy
